snippet: A finance-related Twitter meme, #FedValentines, began on Friday morning and inspired hundreds of submissions. (We are particular fans of @planetmoney's "You had me at QE1.") Binyamin Appelbaum collected the best of the wonky mash notes on the...
abstract: A finance-related Twitter meme, #FedValentines, began on Friday morning and inspired hundreds of submissions. (We are particular fans of @planetmoney's "You had me at QE1.") Binyamin Appelbaum collected the best of the wonky mash notes on the Economix blog. Read more »
lead_paragraph: A finance-related Twitter meme, #FedValentines, began on Friday morning and inspired hundreds of submissions. (We are particular fans of @planetmoney's "You had me at QE1.") Binyamin Appelbaum collected the best of the wonky mash notes on the Economix blog. Read more »
